I recently watched a video about that. Apparently, they also fear the backlash (harassment, death threats and stuff) if people aren't satisfied, after what happened with Mass Effect 3.

Honestly, I'm okay with it. I never thought that Half-Life 2 is literally the greatest thing ever (even though it seems to be you duty as gamer to think so) and fount it rather underwhelming.

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b543956368722ec300336a#post_55b543956368722ec300336a
[bq="uc9"]I thought of something interesting; you know how lately the news is constantly fucking complaining about "robots are taking our jobs"?

Automation has been going on for fucking centuries; it's just the jobs that are now being automated are jobs that previously couldn't be automated.

News is being automated so obviously that's going to piss off newscasters.  Even now a fair chunk of news stories are automatically generated from computers; hell even newscasters are starting to be automated and replaced with robots.

Basically: news, "Wait?  Computers are now taking my job?!  Kill it!  Kill it before it has a chance!"[/bq]
DEY TERK ER JERBS

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b557686368724ff90003e5#post_55b557686368724ff90003e5
